cause.description:
Linux is a free and superior Unix-based operating system compared to Windows (and others). However Linux users are a minority in the overall world of computing which is presently dominated by MS Windows.
1. Linux is superior to all ther (non-unix-based/non-opensource/non-free) Operating Systems.
2. Microsoft's use of its monopolistic powers to and patents to destroy opensource is immoral and illegal
3. Open Source software must expand to survive.
cause.mission: spread the use of linux and other open-source software.
cause.name: Spread Linux & Open Source Software
